meanings.sent1: I will prebuild the model airplane before the competition.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to prebuild the new office complex to save time.
meanings.sent3: The students prebuild their science project to impress their teacher.
meanings.sent4: She likes to prebuild her arguments before a debate.
meanings.sent5: The chef will prebuild the cake layers for the wedding.

meanings.definition: A structure or component that is built in advance.
meanings.sent1: The prebuild of the house made the construction process faster.
meanings.sent2: The prebuild for the car engine was ready to be installed.
meanings.sent3: The prebuild of the stage collapsed during the play!
meanings.sent4: The prebuild of the bridge was a lifesaver during the flood.
meanings.sent5: The prebuild of the computer parts saved time for the technicians.
